name: KTGAME
description:
KTGAME is a first person speedrun game.

Doing the best time will be your goal to be part of the top of the ranking, it's up to you to find the best path to reach the finish.

You will only have your legs to do the best time.

Some maps have specificities like bumpers that will propel you in one direction.

More than one way will likely be found by players, it's up to you to find the best one.

RUN RUN RUN for being the best speedrunner.


I am not a developer, please be indulgent

Enjoy !
